column4: Un, dos, tres, quatre, cinc, sièis, sèt, uèch, nòu, dètz.

column2: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten.
column4: Un, dus, tres, quate, cinc, sheis, sèt, ueit, nau, dètz.
Ne son pas las vòstas cadièras.

column2: I want to be a sport reporter.
When did you first notice that Tom was missing?
column4: Quan as remercat peu purmèr còp que mancava lo Tòm ?

column2: Where is the restroom? To the left.
column4: On son los comuns ? Ad esquèrra.

column2: Where can I buy tickets to the theatre?
column4: On podi crompar bilhets de teatre ?

column2: You'll have to study harder next year.
column4: Que't calerà estudiar mei dur l'an qui veng.
